  2. SoundCloud Addresses Terms of Use Allowing AI Training on Uploaded Music  Pitchfork
  3. SoundCloud ‘fixes’ AI policy following backlash; CEO Eliah Seton says ‘AI should support artists, not replace them’  Music Business Worldwide
  4. SoundCloud says it isn’t using your music to train generative AI tools  The Verge
  5. SoundCloud faces backlash after adding an AI training clause in its user terms  fastcompany.com

item.title: China's Baidu looks to patent AI system to decipher animal sounds - Reuters
item.description:
1. China's Baidu looks to patent AI system to decipher animal sounds  Reuters
  2. Chinese Tech Giant Wants to Translate Your Cat's Meows Using AI  futurism.com
  3. New Chinese AI can supposedly help you understand your pets  Boy Genius Report
  4. Hanami concept brings interaction between animals and humans to another level  Yanko Design
  5. Animal-Human Translation Concepts  Trend Hunter
